headline.main: ROME RADIO DEPICTS 'ROUGH TIME' OF FOES; Greeks Dare Not Come Down From Mountains, It Explains

lead_paragraph: The Rome radio last night vehemently denied that Italy was interested in a separate peace.
abstract: Rome radio repts Brit and Greeks having rough time in Libya and Albania
